channel.title: Npcdrops.cfg
channel.description:
Just trying to get to terms with npcdrops.cfg
[b]//kbd npcdrop = 50 746 1 3 npcdrop = 50 1540 1 100 npcdrop = 50 1149 1 3[/b]
so will that mean kbd drops one of each item id, but is the last digit the percentage chance of getting dropped ?
thanks.

item.title: Npcdrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

npcdrop = 50 2577 1 3
npcdrop = 50 2581 1 32
npcdrop = 50 1079 1 5
npcdrop = 50 4587 1 31
npcdrop = 50 2856 1 1
npcdrop = 50 2402 1 1
npcdrop = 50 2402 1 1

k here i’ll try to help look at it this way

npcdrop = ID Itemid amount. droprate

so the first number “50” is the npc id.

the number lets see “2402” is the item id.

the number after the item id is the amount of that item that is dropped.

then the last number is the percentage of how often it drops.

so if u want bandos godsword to drop or something, u’d put the id then 1 and 1 or 2 at the last number cuz u dont want it to drop too often, if u want it to be rare i suggest keep % rates at 1 or 2.

hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Npcdrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

Ok well I was just confused because on my server kbd drops a robin hood hat like everytime but its not even there
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: [/size][hr]doesn’t matter i found the other half of the mystery

npcdrop = 50 2577 1 3
npcdrop = 50 2581 1 32
npcdrop = 50 1079 1 5
npcdrop = 50 4587 1 31
npcdrop = 50 2856 1 1
npcdrop = 50 2402 1 1
npcdrop = 50 2402 1 1

Read full topic

item.title: Npcdrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Yeah that’s right.

1st number is the npc id

Second is the item id

3rd is the amount

4th is the % chance of drop.

Read full topic
